name: gandhi-discord-bot
author: Matthieu FREITAG
description: Discord bot that tracks various user activities in voice channels and produces statistics

scripts.commands:view: npm run build && node --enable-source-maps dist/src/index.js commands view
scripts.commands:register: npm run build && node --enable-source-maps dist/src/index.js commands register
scripts.commands:rename: npm run build && node --enable-source-maps dist/src/index.js commands rename
scripts.commands:delete: npm run build && node --enable-source-maps dist/src/index.js commands delete
scripts.commands:clear: npm run build && node --enable-source-maps dist/src/index.js commands clear
